verses.text: \w In|strong="H3427"\w* earlier times \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w made|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Zebulun \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Naphtali \w of|strong="H0776"\w* small value, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* gave \w it|strong="H5921"\w* glory, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sea, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* other side \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Jordan, Galilee \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* dark \w have|strong="H0834"\w* seen \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* light, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* living \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* deepest night, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* light \w is|strong="H0834"\w* shining.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* made \w them|strong="H0853"\w* very glad, increasing \w their|strong="H3588"\w* joy. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* glad \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* men \w are|strong="H3117"\w* glad \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* getting \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* grain, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* division \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* goods taken \w in|strong="H3117"\w* war.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H0784"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w the|strong="H3605"\w* yoke \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neck \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rod \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* back, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rod \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* cruel master, \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* broken, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Midian.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* every boot \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* war \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* sounding step, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* clothing rolled \w in|strong="H5921"\w* blood, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* burning, food \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fire.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* child \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7068"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* son \w is|strong="H0369"\w* given; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w government|strong="H4951"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* placed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* hands; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* named Wise Guide, Strong \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, Father \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, Prince \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* increase \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w rule|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* peace there \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* no end, \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* seat \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w David|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* kingdom; \w to|strong="H3478"\w* make \w it|strong="H7971"\w* strong, supporting \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* wise decision \w and|strong="H3478"\w* righteousness, now \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* ever. \w By|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* fixed \w purpose|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* armies \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* done.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H0669"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w a|strong="H3427"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0669"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w has|strong="H0669"\w* come \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*;

\w And|strong="H5307"\w* all \w the|strong="H1129"\w* people \w will|strong="H5307"\w* \w have|strong="H1129"\w* experience \w of|strong="H0730"\w* \w it|strong="H1129"\w*, even Ephraim \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* men \w of|strong="H0730"\w* Samaria, \w who|strong="H1129"\w* say \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* pride \w of|strong="H0730"\w* \w their|strong="H5307"\w* uplifted hearts,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* bricks \w have|strong="H3068"\w* come \w down|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H5921"\w* we \w will|strong="H3068"\w* put \w up|strong="H5921"\w* buildings \w of|strong="H3068"\w* cut stone \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* place: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sycamores \w are|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w down|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* changed \w to|strong="H5921"\w* cedars.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w cause|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w* strong \w the|strong="H3605"\w* haters \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, driving \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w make|strong="H7725"\w* war \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*;

Aram \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* east, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Philistines \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* west, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* open mouths. \w For|strong="H6635"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wrath \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w is|strong="H3068"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w still|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* people \w was|strong="H3068"\w* not turned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3772"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* sent punishment \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* no prayer \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* armies.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* cause \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* Israel \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*, \w high|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* low, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* day.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* man \w who|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* honoured \w and|strong="H2088"\w* responsible \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* head, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* prophet \w who|strong="H2088"\w* gives false teaching \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* tail.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* guides \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cause|strong="H7725"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* wandering \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3651"\w* \w way|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* guided \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* destruction.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* cause \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H0784"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* no pleasure \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* young men, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* no pity \w on|strong="H3341"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* widows \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* children without fathers: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* are \w all|strong="H0398"\w* haters \w of|strong="H0398"\w* God \w and|strong="H0398"\w* evil-doers, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* foolish words come \w from|strong="H0784"\w* every mouth. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H0398"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* wrath \w is|strong="H0784"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* turned \w away|strong="H0398"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* hand \w is|strong="H0784"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H0784"\w* still.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* evil \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w burning|strong="H0784"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; \w the|strong="H0413"\w* blackberries \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thorns \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w burned|strong="H6272"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w*; \w the|strong="H0413"\w* thick woods \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, rolling \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* dark clouds \w of|strong="H0776"\w* smoke.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* land \w was|strong="H0376"\w* dark \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w armies|strong="H2220"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0376"\w* take men's \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w food|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* right \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* cutting \w off|strong="H5921"\w* bits \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* need; \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* meal \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w enough|strong="H3027"\w*; \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* pity \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brother; \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* \w making|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* meal \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flesh \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbour.
Manasseh was making a meal of Ephraim, and Ephraim of Manasseh; and together they were attacking Judah. For all this his wrath is not turned away, but his hand is stretched out still.
